content: this sweet textured hat is perfect for charity crafting this is my favorite pattern to make for little hats big hearts i keep it in my car crochet bag because it s so simple it works up on autopilot i ve added this pattern as a pdf download for easy charity crocheting please let me know you re planning to donate a hat to little hats big hearts by adding this pattern to your ravelry queue or favorites before you download thank you for your generous giving crochet was meant to be shared <3
